attributes.action: Emergency Aid for Serbia and Bosnia.
attributes.additional_details:
Aid for Serbia and Bosnia is urgently needed from the UK and other more fortunate nations, especially those with flood experience.

Serbia and Bosnia are experiencing the worst flooding in 120 years.

Serbia and Bosnia do not have the resources to deal with their situation without foreign aid.

As a matter of urgency, the UK goverment must respond by sending aid to Serbia and Bosnia. Aid will be needed long after this emergency in order to rebuild and repair after damage and to compensate for loss of crops and livestock.
